name: Keppo: The Space Prankster
description:
Keppo: The Space Prankster is a 3rd Person Action Arcade game where you control Keppo, a streamer escaping from the police throught a Space Mine  after messing up with some crystals in this prohibited zone for views. 

       Use the Dash Attack to defeat enemies and Keppo's tongue to travel throught the environment to make your way into a safe zone while making the most views possible! 

       You can give it a try and also go for the fastest record! Can you beat 1m:30s for bonus viewers?


Game's still in development, some bugs may occur and consider leaving some feedback! We're are looking to apply for INDIE X so all feedback will be much appreciated!

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD -> Movement
SPACE -> Jump
MOUSE1 -> Grappling Hook
SHIFT or MOUSE2 - > Dash Attack

T -> Quick Reset

ESC -> Pause Game

!MAC USERS! - THIS VERSION CAN'T BE PLAYER WITHOUT 16:9 RESOLUTION!
